text: A minaudière is a women's fashion accessory, thought to be a jewellery piece.Catherine Cariou, « La Minaudière de Van Cleef & Arpels », Paris Joaillerie, 5 mars 2007, lire en ligne (page consultée le 16 juin 2011) It is meant as a replacement for an evening bag. It has some compartments that allows storage for several items in a small space, such as a makeup compact, lipstick, watch, reading glasses, or keys. ==References== Category:Accessories
title: Minaudière
